dcterms:description: The dataset contains entries for two different property and casualty insurance lines, namely personal auto (PA) and commercial auto (CA), and for three regions: Ontario (ON), Alberta (AB) and Atlantic Canada (ATL). Incremental incurred claim amounts and earned premiums are provided in the dataset, covering the period from the first semester of 1997 to the second semester of 2017.
dcterms:title: General Insurance Statistical Agency (GISA) dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides information on insurance contracts and liabilities, specifically related to IFRS 17 standards for insurance contracts.
dcterms:title: Canadian automobile insurance dataset
